attributes.action: Retain the Current Laws on Capital Punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has always been said that if the citizens of this country, rather than politicians, were allowed to vote  each law in, one by one, then Hanging  would re-appear on our statute books. Do not let this wonderful vox populis (E-Petions) allow the Great British  opposition to Capital Punishment (an essential tenant, that leads the world in human rights understanding and good law making) be undermined by ignorance. Though the E-petition is a wonderful place to let our voices be heard never forget we are one of the most liberal and safe countries in the world. Vote thoughtfully and vote for the person not the party.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
